title: Uncertainty Principles on Harmonic Manifolds of Rank One
abstract:
We show various uncertainty principles for the Fourier transform on harmonic
manifolds of rank one. In particular, we derive a Heisenberg uncertainty
principle, a Morgen theorem, an uncertainty principle for the Schr\"odinger
equation and a version of H\"omanders theorem. Furthermore, we generalise the
in the Euclidean case well-known Hausdorff-Young inequality for the Fourier
transform, to harmonic manifolds of rank one.
